#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
#define min(a,b) (a>b?b:a)
main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
int a[t];
int i;
for(i=0;i<t;++i)
    cin>>a[i];
int sumo=0,sume=0;
for(i=0;i<t;++i)
{
    if(a[i]%2==0)
        ++sume;
    else
       ++sumo;
}
int d=sumo-sume;
if(d<0)
    d=-d;
cout<<d;
return 0;
}
